title: Dynamic Capability Enhancement Strategies for Multinational Corporations in the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of global business environments and foundational organizational management
context.additional_context: Real-time online education conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can specifically explain six types of uncertainties that pandemics impose on multinational corporations
Learners can design uncertainty management strategies using the dynamic capability (sensing-responding-learning) framework
Learners can present strategies to enhance organizational resilience through industry-specific case analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
